item.title: Version 1.0.3
item.description: - We updated the layout of the side menu. - We implemented a feature that makes it easier to see- and interact with messages. - We redesigned the support screen to make it more straight forward and easier to use. - We implemented a function to add favorite drivers by scanning the drivers QR code. - We now show the price and distance in the QR code at a "Hop in trip". - We now show a less complex QR code.
